Name: Secrets of the Lost Tomb
About the game: Explore the deepest and darkest secrets that lie within an ancient Egyptian tomb. Take on the role of an agent searching for the riches that lie within this mysterious tomb. Go through chambers and obstacles while fighting the evil that lies within. Do you have what it takes to escape alive? Secrets of the Lost Tomb is an adventure-style role-playing game taking place in the pyramids and abandoned outbacks of ancient Egypt. As an agent on a military investigation, you are tasked with exploring the unknown: a dark and dangerous tomb. Very few have ever crossed the mysterious and dangerous areas, and no one has come out alive. Are you willing to take on the challenge? Features: First-person and third-person perspectives Multiplayer mode that allows you to fight with your friends Single-player story mode with hours of immersive and challenging gameplay Immersive user interface, soundtracks, and gameplay ALL COMPLETELY FREE Download Secrets of the Lost Tomb now!
